featured.name: VibedIn
featured.description: A modern profile discovery platform that connects people based on shared interests and experiences. Features advanced search capabilities, real-time filtering, and an intuitive interface for finding and connecting with like-minded individuals.

featured.name: Postily
featured.description: Social media that actually works for creators. A platform built for creators, not corporations. Get verified for free, earn from your content, and never pay a subscription. Fair monetization, completely free access, and real identity verification.
